messages.subject: New picture
messages.msgSnippet: Just a note- I ve taken the liberty of doing a sketch based on Yamazaki, Tetsu and Tatsu from the Peacemaker manga and posted it in the illustrations section.
messages.messageBody:
Just a note- I've taken the liberty of doing a sketch based on
Yamazaki, Tetsu and Tatsu from the Peacemaker manga and posted it in
the illustrations section. It's my very very first time uploading a
file! Any comments appreciated.

messages.subject: New picture
messages.msgSnippet: Under Single Originals-- just posted a drawing of Nakano Takeko that I did on Thanksgiving night, in the midst of an otherwise rather unconfortable setting. I
messages.messageBody:
Under Single Originals-- just posted a drawing of Nakano Takeko that I
did on Thanksgiving night, in the midst of an otherwise rather
unconfortable setting.

I hope you all like it.

--M.
